VII.iii.1.A.1.a
.
Requirement That Claimants Submit a Prescribed Form
The Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) will consider a claim for an apportionment of a beneficiary’s VA benefits only upon receipt of
VA Form 21-0788, Information Regarding Apportionment of Beneficiary’s Award
.
Note
:  The requirement that a claimant file a claim for apportionment on
VA Form 21-0788
went into effect on March 24, 2015.  If a claimant requests an apportionment on or after that date on anything other than a
VA Form 21-0788
, treat the correspondence as a request for an application
.
Reference
:  For more information on requests for application, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 2.G
.
